languages.text: "Регистрирую неизвестные модификации мельта-орудия. Настаиваю на реквизировании объекта для установления допустимости спецификаций".
languages.translation_comment: Palace of Justice, after judging the RT's subjects. Examining the oversized cannon.

traits.locale_text: "Регистрирую неизвестные модификации мельта-орудия. Настаиваю на реквизировании объекта для установления допустимости спецификаций".

languages.text: "I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."
languages.translation_comment: Palace of Justice, after judging the RT's subjects. Examining the oversized cannon.
languages.original_text: "Регистрирую неизвестные модификации мельта-орудия. Настаиваю на реквизировании объекта для установления допустимости спецификаций".

traits.locale_text: "I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."
"I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."
"I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."
"I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."
"I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."
"I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."

languages.text: 「メルタウェポンに対して不明な改造が施されていることを確認した。この構成が許可されるものであるかを確認するため、本品の徴用を強く要求する」
languages.original_text: "I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."

traits.locale_text: 「メルタウェポンに対して不明な改造が施されていることを確認した。この構成が許可されるものであるかを確認するため、本品の徴用を強く要求する」

languages.text: "Ich registriere unbekannte Modifikationen an der Melterwaffe. Ich bestehe darauf, dieses Objekt zu requirieren, um die Zulässigkeit der Konfiguration zu überprüfen."
languages.original_text: "I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."

traits.locale_text: "Ich registriere unbekannte Modifikationen an der Melterwaffe. Ich bestehe darauf, dieses Objekt zu requirieren, um die Zulässigkeit der Konfiguration zu überprüfen."

languages.text: « Je relève des modifications de nature inconnue apportées à l'arme à fusion. J'insiste pour la réquisitionner afin de vérifier la conformité de sa configuration. »
languages.original_text: "I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."

traits.locale_text: « Je relève des modifications de nature inconnue apportées à l'arme à fusion. J'insiste pour la réquisitionner afin de vérifier la conformité de sa configuration. »

languages.text: «Detecto modificaciones desconocidas en esta arma de fusión. Insisto en la necesidad de requisar este artículo a fin de determinar la legitimidad de su configuración».
languages.original_text: "I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."

traits.locale_text: «Detecto modificaciones desconocidas en esta arma de fusión. Insisto en la necesidad de requisar este artículo a fin de determinar la legitimidad de su configuración».

languages.text: “检测到针对热熔武器的未知更改。我坚持征用这件武器，我需要确定它的结构是否允许这样的更改。”
languages.original_text: "I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."

traits.locale_text: “检测到针对热熔武器的未知更改。我坚持征用这件武器，我需要确定它的结构是否允许这样的更改。”

languages.text: "Melta silahına yapılan bilinmeyen değişiklikleri kayda geçiriyorum. Bu nesnenin ne ölçüde yapılandırılabileceğinin tespit edilmesi gerekliliğinde ısrar ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."

traits.locale_text: "Melta silahına yapılan bilinmeyen değişiklikleri kayda geçiriyorum. Bu nesnenin ne ölçüde yapılandırılabileceğinin tespit edilmesi gerekliliğinde ısrar ediyorum."

languages.original_text: "I am registering unknown modifications made to the melta weapon. I insist on requisitioning this object for the purpose of ascertaining the permissibility of its configuration."
